verses.roman:
"deva, śuna āra eka aparūpa vāt!
mahāprabhu kṣetra chāḍi' yābena ālālanātha!"

synonyms: deva—my dear King; śuna—hear; āra—another; eka—one; aparūpa—uncommon; vāt—news; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṣetra chāḍi'-leaving Jagannātha Purī; yābena—will go; ālālanātha—to Ālālanātha.
translation: "My dear King," he said,"please hear one uncommon item of news. Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu wants to leave Jagannātha Purī and go to Ālālanātha."
